H0.text: who developed the tcp ip reference model. Jon Postel

H1.text: who developed the tcp ip reference model. Bob Kahn

H2.text: who developed the tcp ip reference model. Larry Roberts

H3.text: who developed the tcp ip reference model. Vint Cerf

A4.text: He wrote the first TCP with Yogen Dalal and Carl Sunshine, called Specification of Internet Transmission Control Program (RFC 675), published in December 1974.

A5.text: co-designed the DoD TCP/IP protocol suite with Kahn.

A6.text: During the summer of 1973, Kahn and Cerf worked out a fundamental reformulation, in which the differences between local network protocols were hidden by using a common internetwork protocol.
